class.name: GFComponent
class.brief_description: A reference to a Glecs component from a [GFWorld] that is attatached to an entity.

method.name: _build
method.description:
Override this method to build a component associated with a [Script]. The example below shows how to build a component associated with a custom Velocity [Script]: [codeblock] class_name Velocity2 extends GFComponent
func _build(b:GFComponentBuilder) -> void: b.add_member("value", TYPE_VECTOR2) [/codeblock]

method.name: get_source_entity
get_source_id
getm
method.description:
Returns the value of a component's member. [codeblock] var entity = GFEntity.spawn() entity.add_component("glecs/meta/Vector2") var vec2 = entity.get_component("glecs/meta/Vector2")
vec2.getm("x") [/codeblock]

method.name: setm
method.description:
Sets the value of a component's member. [codeblock] var entity = GFEntity.spawn() entity.add_component("glecs/meta/Vector2") var vec2 = entity.get_component("glecs/meta/Vector2")
vec2.setm("x", 3.14) [/codeblock]
